title: Rhetoric

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Listen to. Learn their night feedback tonight.
- At night, if you don't control The Psychopath, you may Defame a player in addition to your night action. When a Defamed player is hanged, you gain a stack of Testimony. Defamed lasts indefinitely as a status effect.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, if you have two stacks of Testimony, you may choose a player in addition to your night action. During the day tomorrow, if you are hanged, the chosen player is hanged instead.
Kill Note Addition:
*"Every word holds weight. Listen closely, next time."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4926
*Manifest your words. Engage in deeper thinking.*
